mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TransTaskResult JOIN OCRResult ON OCRResult.ocrTaskId = TransTaskResult.id JOIN OCRTask ON OCRResult.ocrTaskId = OCRTask.id AND OCRTask.taskId = #{taskId} order by TransTaskResult.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectts.TransTaskResult (ocrResultId, status, failCause, originalText, translatedText, createdAt, updatedAt, isRecovery, errorReportId, translateFrom, translateTo) VALUES (#{ocrResultId}, DEFAULT, null, #{originalText}, null, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, null, #{translateFrom}, #{translateTo});
mapper.update: UPDATE projectts.TransTaskResult t SET t.ocrResultId = #{ocrResultId}, t.status = #{status}, t.failCause = #{failCause}, t.originalText = #{originalText}, t.translatedText = #{translatedText}, t.isRecovery = #{isRecovery}, t.errorReportId = #{errorReportId}, t.translateFrom = #{translateFrom}, t.translateTo = #{translateTo} WHERE t.id = #{id};
